title: ***HUGE group of 50 1909 Obaks Available!!  Price lowered!!***
author: shammus

posts.post_title: ***HUGE group of 50 1909 Obaks Available!!  Price lowered!!***
posts.post_content:
Have a large group of nearly two-thirds of a set of 1909 Obaks I'm making available for sale or trade. There are even a few high grade - 50s, 60s and 70s in here too. In addition to those, there are several SGC 30s and 40s, several of the more desireable horizontal poses, and a few of the tougher cards in the set such as Whalen, Harkins, etc... Also present are a couple cards missing color palettes giving those examples sort of a unique look.

Many of the cards in this group are very nice considering 09 Obaks are typically found in bad shape. Even the cards that are in AUT holders are still very nice. Many of these actually are the handcut/frameless variation which typically end up in AUT holders anyway. 

All in all, this would instantly give someone 49 out of 76 cards in the set.  Plus add in a 50th card, which is a dupe of Hogan, but kind of a neat card as it's missed a blue color pass during it's original print run so the colors are off.  The opportunity to acquire a group of this size only comes around once in a great while.  Asking $5800 delivered which is a tiny percentage of what the complete 09 Obak set went for in REA a couple months back.  That went for $25k plus if I recall....  

Scans available upon request and I'm happy to trade for cards on my wantlist.  I'll also listen to offers on individual cards if anyone wants to go that route.  Thanks in advance!

Baum SGC 20
Beall SGC 30

Brown (horizontal) SGC 70

Price for the lot lowered to $5800.  Would consider selling or trading individual cards as well so send me your offers if there are cards you need!

Brian
